Generation V.Black: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
Generation V.White: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
Generation V.Black 2: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.
Generation V.White 2: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.

Generation VI.X: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
Generation VI.Y: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

Generation VIII.Sword: From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of electricity. Its red core contains an enormous amount of energy.
Generation VIII.Shield: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn't a living creature.

Generation VIII.Sword: Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
